PyEpoc

1.0

This module enables Python to communicate with the Emotiv Epoc head-set and Emotiv's EmoComposer, using Emotiv's dynamic link libraries. Although some functions return data in a way that differs from the Emotiv SDK, PyEpoc functions should be familiar to those using the Emotiv SDK.

Classes:

  • EpocHandler

  • InputSensorDescriptor
